llz:MyRelic.NAME: Test Relic
llz:MyRelic.FLAVOR: This person is lazy and wrote nothing.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b1 card.

llz_Els.NAME: Pebble
llz_Els.FLAVOR: Though they have piled up into a small mountain, each one is unique.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yDexterity. The #yDexterity granted each combat will not exceed the number of this relic.

llz_zallc.NAME: Messy Nest
llz_zallc.FLAVOR: This bird is extinct, but its creations linger.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain a random status card that has been #yllzmod:modified.

llz_zic.NAME: Paper Boat
llz_zic.FLAVOR: Fragile material folded repeatedly to form a very sturdy structure.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 layer of #yPlated Armor.

llz_sentg.NAME: Ecological Cylinder
llz_sentg.FLAVOR: Some seeds remain in the nest, of great research value.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rMessy Nest. When you draw a status card, it is #yllzmod:modified.

llz_tuoly.NAME: Gyroscope
llz_tuoly.FLAVOR: Leftover parts after assembling the machine.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you shuffle your draw pile each combat, draw cards until your hand is full.

llz_jiusj.NAME: Old Collection of Poems
llz_jiusj.FLAVOR: There are multiple signatures on the title page, it's unclear who the original owner was.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yllzmod:modify a card, upgrade it.

llz_fengbxz.NAME: Stitched Heart
llz_fengbxz.FLAVOR: “It fits perfectly, maybe I made it.”
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time your hand is full each turn, gain [E] .

llz_caodhx.NAME: Superconducting Core
llz_caodhx.FLAVOR: Better performance at lower temperatures, as long as you don't do intense activities.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play consecutive 0-cost cards, gain #b3 #yBlock.

llz_jiaklhs.NAME: Crustacean Fossil
llz_jiaklhs.FLAVOR: These bugs are everywhere now, I admire their cleverness.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you take damage each combat, gain #b20 #yBlock.

llz_beiylj.NAME: Spare Parts
DESCRIPTIONS: When the number of Sentries is 0, immediately generate one.

llz_guanglzhq.NAME: Photon Converter
llz_guanglzhq.FLAVOR: The problem is, there's no daylight in the tower.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, all machines gain charge equal to your [E] limit.

llz_yuanzz.NAME: Atomic Clock
llz_yuanzz.FLAVOR: As it ascends, it becomes less accurate.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the first turn, gain #b1 #yStrength. NL At the start of the second turn, gain #b1 #yDexterity. NL At the start of the third turn, gain #b1 #yllzmod:focus.
